overview:
Daniel Marschner is a Co-Founder of 6Wunderkinder and the Head Application Engineer for Wunderlist and Wunderkit. He spends most of his time and energy building the new productivity and co-working platform Wunderkit. He also relays information to the PR and Marketing team to make sure they are up-to-date with modifications made to all platforms.

Prior to forming 6Wunderkinder, Daniel enrolled on an intensive apprenticeship with Siemens AG as a specialized computer scientist for application development. During his time there he worked on various projects involving several computer programming languages. Equipped with this knowledge he then formed Innovatics GmbH, working as the Chief Web developer. Daniel has expertise in creating vast community platforms.
